default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: My name is Pacassi... I'm an orphan of the old generation, a walking contaminant. Please keep your distance.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Energy level boosted. Please upgrade your radiation protection accordingly.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: You still haven't given up... Then, touch me... and prepare to be pierced through by radiation.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I won't let you down.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: I did it.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Sorry... I'm sorry...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Get away... from me!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: At last... it's over.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hello, Chief. Do you have any work for me today?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Is there anything I can help with, Chief? I'm not used to staying idle and doing nothing.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: The modification on this arm is to help the muscles exert force... Sorry, but please don't touch it. No, it's not forbidden. It's just that... it has absorbed too much radiation.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: I must live on, and remember everything that happened in the town. Otherwise, everything we'd experienced will be meaningless...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I still remember the last accident with the power station. That winter, the snow ruined the greater part of the grid. In thirty days, the town's population reduced by a quarter. We only found them under the melted snow when the spring came the next year...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Mayek means lighthouse. Even in the darkest hour, it provides the wanderers with guidance and hope. But no one knows, that even the lighthouse itself can be devoured by darkness...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I never dream of pity from others, not even from you. I... don't want to live without dignity, as an experimental subject or an exotic animal on display...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: No one has ever told me what friendship means... I've read it in a book, that a friend is someone you would die for... If that's true, then you're my friend, my only friend.

default.title: Idle
default.text: ...You've been working for hours, Chief. Don't you want to take a break?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Chief... Is this... how people in the DisCity show friendliness? Hmm... Okay.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Could you... stop staring at me? I... I'm not very used to it.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I'll get it done.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I've finished my work. Please give me a new task.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The radiation has become stronger.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: I'm used to battles. I can certainly do it.

winter_night.title: Obtain Attire
winter_night.text: Chief, please move closer to the fire. Even the outskirts of Mayek are much colder than DisCity. Take care and stay warm.

winter_night.title: Greeting
winter_night.text: Chief, do you feel warmer now? If you're still feeling cold... have some of the borscht I've just cooked.

winter_night.title: Ordinary Contact 1
winter_night.text: "A hundred years have passed. The young city has become the treasure and marvel of the Northern nation..." I found this poetry collection in Bureau's library. It's very interesting... Care to read it, Chief?

winter_night.title: Ordinary Contact 2
winter_night.text: This was once the furthest I'd been from Mayek. And now... it's also the closest I've been to it.

winter_night.title: Idle
winter_night.text: When I was little, I always hoped winter could pass sooner. But now, I wish it could stay longer... Human beings are indeed strange.

winter_night.title: Annoyed
winter_night.text: I... I only added some Mayek-style cutting and materials to the uniform. I suppose... I haven't violated the Bureau's rules, have I...?

winter_night.title: Special Attention
winter_night.text: Bone-chilling winds and snowy nights are unique to Mayek, and those who stand firm in winter nights in snow gear deserve to stay in our memories eternally too...

frostforged_maiden.title: Obtain Attire
frostforged_maiden.text: Hello, laborer. I'm winter's daughter, a unique being born of ice and snow. Every winter, I give blessings to all the laborers toiling away tirelessly. Thus people call me Winter Maiden.

frostforged_maiden.title: Greeting
frostforged_maiden.text: You came. Is this year's work coming to an end? Then, please take a long, good rest, and wait for the spring to come.

frostforged_maiden.title: Ordinary Contact 1
frostforged_maiden.text: I was once told by steel workers: when molten iron is poured into a quench chamber, plumes of vapor will gush out of the chimneys, just as grand as how festive fireworks shoot into the sky.

frostforged_maiden.title: Ordinary Contact 2
frostforged_maiden.text: Mourn not for my departure, laborers, for when you see me all gone, it simply heralds the coming of spring, where lives are brought back to the worldâ€¦ By then, I'll be coverging into the blast furnace, seeping into the earth, just to be around in another existence.

frostforged_maiden.title: Idle
frostforged_maiden.text: So you heard about the yield target being overfulfilled too? Isn't that wonderful! Everyone can enjoy a lovely holiday this winter.

frostforged_maiden.title: Annoyed
frostforged_maiden.text: Thank you, but I really don't need this thick scarf.

frostforged_maiden.title: Special Attention
frostforged_maiden.text: Thank you for bestowing special attention on me all along, but I'm destined to melt and thaw, just as how the laborers will have their victory over the winter.
